alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley County, Musselshell County; Northern Rosebud, Northern Treasure Counties; Stillwater County; Wheatland County, Sweet Grass County; Yellowstone County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 04 at 2:19PM MDT until September 04 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * IMPACTS: Low humidities, hot temperatures, and strong gusty winds will create erratic fire behavior. * AFFECTED AREA: In South Central MT Fire Zones...124...125...127...128. In Southeast MT Fire Zone...130. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central MT...Golden Valley...Musselshell...Wheatland. In South Central MT...Stillwater...Sweet Grass...Yellowstone. In Southeast MT...Rosebud...Treasure. * WIND: West to northwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 10 percent. * TEMPERATURES: In the upper 90s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley County, Musselshell County; Northern Rosebud, Northern Treasure Counties; Stillwater County; Wheatland County, Sweet Grass County; Yellowstone County
